treksJson.name: Lahes Cave Trek
treksJson.attractions: Lush green gorges, Valleys, dense forests
treksJson.description: This is a trek that goes forward from Triund to Snowline Cafe to Ilaqua Got. It takes around 1 hour from Triund to Snowline. You can read more about Trek to Triund from our blog titled ?Whispers in the Mountains | Triund, Himachal Pradesh?. From Ilaqua it takes 2-2.5hrs to Lahesh Cave. Its very important that you carry proper shoes and gear for this climb. As we went in Summers around May, we experienced heavy snow and faced lot of hiccups. We had to cross two avalanches and Climbing down can be risky as your feet tend to slip and get immersed down in the snow. Lahesh caves was filled with snow. But its a must climb till Lahesh Caves.Journey Beyond Lahesh cave is pretty tough and risky. Only few of us went further and most brave men among us gave up. Indrahar pass is  untouched by humans and is hence beautiful.
